column4: Are there a lot of recurring problems with Ubuntu and WEP/WPA Win32 hosts?
what has win32 hosts got to do with it ?
The host upon which the connection is served ...
the host is not important as long as the keyus are compatible
I'm pretty sure that different platforms conform to the RFC in different ways ...
as long as the client is compatible with the encyription level it shouldn't be a problem
Great, but I've encountered some issues connecting to a Win32 host from Ubuntu 9.10.
I've not seen - or had such problems
then don't ask if people are having problems if you don't want the answer
I'm not being hostile, you asked if people where having problems - I'm telling you I'm not
I'm glad, that you speak for "people"
then why are you asking if you don't want people to respond
I think your "bad day" shouldn't rub off on IRC.
I'm not having a bad day, I've just answered your question, it's working fine, I'm not aware of any problems
